typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		{Data Flow ID} as string,
		{Data Flow Code Revision} as string,
		{Data Flow Timestamp} as string,
		{Data Flow From System} as string,
		{Data Flow From System ID} as string,
		{Data Flow To System} as string,
		{Data Flow To System ID} as string,
		{Data Flow Link Description} as string,
		{Data Flow Link ID} as string,
		{Data Flow Link Type} as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	isolationLevel: 'READ_UNCOMMITTED',
	format: 'table') ~> source1
source1 sort(asc({Data Flow Link Description}, true)) ~> Sort1
Sort1 filter({Data Flow Link Description}!="041 - TMSInvalidMessage") ~> Filter1
Filter1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> sink1
